entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:37 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 5:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
